Best Services

We consistently delivers exceptional services to Our clients and customers.We prioritize customer satisfaction and strive to exceed expectations in every interaction

Best industry experts

We have a team of skilled professionals who are knowledgeable, reliable, and friendly. And provide timely and efficient services using latest tools and technology

Transparency

We are transparent in our communication and pricing, and we go extra mile for our clients to ensure their needs and satisfaction.

Customer Satisfaction

Customer Satisfaction is our core an prime attribute of company.We are consistently meeting client expections with or quick, easy and personalized ideas.

Available 24/7

We pride ourselves on our unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction, which is why we offer 24/7 availability to meet your needs around the clock

Professional people … provide excellent service and response 👍

I got my solar system installed by Ats. My experience with this company was very good and they have highly professional team. They are highly recommended.

2023-04-13
 
 
  
 
I am an electrical engineer and I know the details of solar works. ATS has a team of dedicated professional engineers and they do their work in sincerity and honesty. They use A class materia, no compromise on quality.

2023-04-12
 
 
  
 
ATS team is very professional and had a chance to acquire their services for couple of my projects. They are good in meeting timelines and their work quality is up to mark
  
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Abdul Rauf 
 
2023-04-12
 
 
  
 
I got solar system installed at my house in ASKARI 14 RAWALPINDI by ATS Engineering.They have a team of professionals and execute every task in a professional manner.I am thankful to Mr Haider and am impressed by his professional approach.I will definitely recommend ATS Engineering to my friends for installation of this system.
  
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Khalid Kamal 
 
2023-04-12
 
 
  
 
EXCELLENT JOB
ATS did a great job and my bill is almost ZERO. They are a team of true professionals and dedicated workers.
My best wishes for the ATS.
  
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Riasat Khan 
 
2023-04-11
 
 
  
 
An excellent outfit that installed 10.4 KVA system at my house in DHA-1 Islamabad in 2018; good team with exceptionally streamlined after sale service: I pray for the best of everything for the organisation n remark it the company to be approached for provision of services
  
 
 
  
 
 
 
  
 
 
 Saqib Sharif 
 
2023-04-10
 
 
  
 
15 kva on grid inverter installed in Jan 23. Monthly average units are 70+. Very satisfied with installation and aftersale service

Explore Details

Services We Provide

Solar Solutions
Solar Solutions involves the installation of solar panels or other solar devices that capture energy from the sun and convert it into usable electricity.Its a renewable energy source.
Read More
Fabrication
Solar street lights are composed of a simple structure of LED, Battery unit, Pole and a Solar Panel. It is designed to withstand the dark hours of night with an automated sensing switch.
Read More
Industrial Fans
Industrial fans are the workhorses of the air circulation world. Built tough and designed for power, they're the unsung heroes of many industrial processes and environments.
Read More

Our Clients

ATS Engineering Sales & Services

About ATS Engineering

Established in 2005, ATS Engineering is a Sales & Services Company currently in the business of Solar Energy Solutions, Fabrication and Industrial Fans all at domestic, commercial & industrial level. ATS is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company.

ATS Engineering is a leading provider of solar panels and fabrication services. The company is dedicated to providing sustainable energy solutions to its customers, helping them reduce their carbon footprint and save money on energy costs. With years of experience in the industry, ATS Engineering has developed a reputation for delivering high-quality products and services to its clients.
